title: Border, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Mechlin-style border with an elaborate fond interspersed by asymmetric floral garland and ribbons. Fond: amures. Modes: fond simple, portes.
